description:
From pizza and French fries, to their first air, Sweet Protection has developed a helmet just for little rippers. Designed to keep the weight down and the safety high, the Winder MIPS helmet will help protect them on the snow. Outfitted with MIPS (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) technology; should they take a spill, rotational forces are reduced, so you get to feel a bit better when they discover the direct relationship between speed and fun.

  • In mold construction is lightweight and allows impact force to spread out, reducing the amount of force that makes it through the helmet
  • MIPS® helps with the reduction of rotational forces in the event of a crash
  • Dial in the perfect fit with an adjustable dial fit system that provides a precise and comfortable fit
  • Rear strap for securing goggles
  • Goggle garage helps pull warm air away from goggles, reducing fogging
  • 10 air vents let your head breathe
  • Removable moisture wicking liner is soft and easy to pop in the wash
name: SWEET PROTECTION Winder Mips Helmet JR - Infants to Youths
